'''Through the Ranks''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained on the island of [[Morrow's Reach]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Kill 5 different guard types at the same time.</big>

== Walkthrough ==
''Click '''Expand''' for tips.''
<div class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed">
In the final stage (near Ignatia), '''knock-out''' each type of guard, then kill them at your leisure, with 5 different crew members in Shadow mode.
</div>
